alert.note: Alert for Baylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 10:19PM CDT until August 07 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Baylor County in northern Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1019 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles north of Red Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Seymour, Red Springs, Lake Kemp, and Mabelle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
